name: HC-110
notes: Common dilutions: Dilution A (1:15), Dilution B (1:31), Dilution C (1:19), Dilution D (1:39), Dilution E (1:47), Dilution F (1:79), Dilution H (1:63)

name: DD-X
notes: Common dilutions: Standard (1:4)

name: Rodinal/Adonal
notes: Common dilutions: Standard (1+25), Economy (1+50), Stand (1+100)

name: Multigrade Developer
notes: Common dilutions: Standard (1+9), Economy (1+14)

name: PQ Universal
notes: Common dilutions: Standard (1+9), Economy (1+19)

name: Ilfotec LC29
notes: The Ilford Ilfotec LC29 is a high-performance liquid concentrate developer formulated for black-and-white film processing. Designed as a low-volume solution, it is ideal for photographers who want high-quality negatives while maintaining efficiency and ease of use. This developer is suited for a range of processing methods, including spiral tanks, trays, and rotary processors and it produces fine-grain negatives with excellent sharpness, making it a reliable choice for both casual film users and professionals.
mixingInstructions:
Determine first either the tank size being used or the number of films to be processed and measure out the
appropriate quantity of concentrate. Always use the smallest measuring cylinder available; it is easier to
measure 10ml accurately in a 50ml cylinder than in a 500ml cylinder.
Add the concentrate to the mixing vessel. A large measuring jug is a good mixing vessel as it provides a
check on the total quantity of solution mixed. Rinse out the measuring cylinder used for the concentrate
into the mixing vessel. Finally add hot and cold water to make up the final volume at the desired temperature
and stir thoroughly.
As most water drawn from pressure mains is highly aerated, we advise that users draw off the water they
need and leave it to stand for a few minutes before using it to make up developers.

name: Xtol
notes: Working life: One-shot or reused replenished; discard 1+1 after use [oai_citation:7‡photrio.com](https://www.photrio.com/forum/threads/very-specific-question-about-d76-self-life.116196/#:~:text=Don%27t%20reuse%20or%20replenish%20this,a%20tray%20is%2024%20hours); Stock life: 6+ months in full tightly-closed bottles [oai_citation:8‡photo.net](https://www.photo.net/forums/topic/244974-d76-question-how-long-can-i-use-it/#:~:text=The%20stock%20concentrate%20is%20good,and%20store%20the%20unused)

name: T-MAX Developer
notes: Working life: One-shot or replenished; working solution ~2 months sealed (full) [oai_citation:9‡business.kodakmoments.com](https://business.kodakmoments.com/sites/default/files/wysiwyg/pro/chemistry/j24.pdf#:~:text=Dilution%20A%206%202%202,Dilution%20D%203%201%201); Stock life: Concentrate ~2 years unopened; stock ~6 months full

name: T-MAX RS Developer
notes: Working life: Designed for replenished systems; stock solution ~2 months (half-full) [oai_citation:10‡business.kodakmoments.com](https://business.kodakmoments.com/sites/default/files/wysiwyg/pro/chemistry/j24.pdf#:~:text=Developer%20Stock%20Solution%206%202,Dilution%20D%203%201%201); Stock life: Concentrate ~2 years; stock ~6 months (full bottle) [oai_citation:11‡business.kodakmoments.com](https://business.kodakmoments.com/sites/default/files/wysiwyg/pro/chemistry/j24.pdf#:~:text=Developer%20Stock%20Solution%206%202,Dilution%20D%203%201%201)

name: Microphen
notes: Working life: One-shot or short reuse; good for push processing (speed-enhancing) [oai_citation:14‡ilfordphoto.com](https://www.ilfordphoto.com/amfile/file/download/file/1903/product/693/#:~:text=Although%20rated%20at%20ISO%20400%2F27%C2%BA%2C,or%20ILFOTEC%20RT%20RAPID%20developers); Stock life: ~6 months full sealed; shorter if partially filled

name: Perceptol
notes: Working life: One-shot (ultra-fine grain developer, similar to Kodak Microdol-X) [oai_citation:15‡125px.com](https://125px.com/docs/film/ilford/Delta_3200-200209.pdf#:~:text=Kodak%20HC,6%2061%2F2%2071%2F2%2010%20121%2F2); Stock life: ~6 months full sealed; use promptly once mixed

name: ILFOSOL 3
notes: Working life: One-shot; do not store working solution (mix fresh each session) [oai_citation:16‡ilfordphoto.com](https://www.ilfordphoto.com/amfile/file/download/file/1903/product/693/#:~:text=Spiral%20tank%2C%20deep%20tank%2C%20dip,%E2%88%92%206%C2%BD%209%C2%BD%2014%20%E2%88%92); Stock life: Concentrate ~24 months unopened; ~6 months once opened (in full bottle)

name: Adonal (Rodinal)
notes: Working life: One-shot; working solution must be used immediately; Stock life: Extremely long concentrate life (5+ years even opened) due to high alkalinity

name: Atomal 49
notes: Working life: One-shot for highest quality; fine-grain developer (speed slightly reduced) [oai_citation:20‡ilfordphoto.com](https://www.ilfordphoto.com/amfile/file/download/file/1905/product/699/#:~:text=1%2B1%20%E2%80%93%206%209%201%2B3,%E2%80%93%201%2B3%2015%2017%20%E2%80%93); Stock life: Use stock within 1 month of mixing for best results (sensitive formula)

name: FX-39 II
notes: Working life: One-shot; higher dilutions possible to control contrast [oai_citation:21‡adox.de](https://www.adox.de/Photo/adox-film-developer/adox-fx-39/#:~:text=Standard%20dilution%201%2B9%20is%20used,as%20a%20%E2%80%9Cone%20shot%E2%80%9D%20developer); Stock life: ~3 years unopened; ~1 year opened (improved keeping properties) [oai_citation:22‡adox.de](https://www.adox.de/Photo/adox-film-developer/adox-fx-39/#:~:text=NEW%3A%20FX,to%20low%20temperatures%20during%20shipping)

name: ADOTECH IV
notes: Working life: Reusable for up to 6 films with incremental time increase [oai_citation:23‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/CMS20_ADOTECHII_instructions.pdf#:~:text=Processing%20of%20ADOX%20CMS%2020,bottle%20with%20water%20to%20100ml) [oai_citation:24‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/CMS20_ADOTECHII_instructions.pdf#:~:text=films%20in%20one%20reel,250%20ml%20with%2020%C2%B0%20or); Stock life: Concentrate remains usable for ~1 year once opened (if water topped-up) [oai_citation:25‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/CMS20_ADOTECHII_instructions.pdf#:~:text=,600%20ml%20of%20working%20solution) [oai_citation:26‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/CMS20_ADOTECHII_instructions.pdf#:~:text=24%C2%B0%20C%20warm%20water%20After,10%20minutes%20to%2013%20minutes)

name: Silvermax Developer
notes: Working life: One-shot; working solution lasts ~1 hour, then discard [oai_citation:27‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/TA_SILVERMAX_EN.pdf#:~:text=Shelfe%20life%20of%20working%20solution,2018); Stock life: Unopened 1–2 years; ~6 months once opened (in cool, dark storage) [oai_citation:28‡adox.de](http://www.adox.de/Technical_Informations/TA_SILVERMAX_EN.pdf#:~:text=Equalizing%20developer%20for%20easy%20to,2018)

name: XT-3
notes: Working life: One-shot or replenish (Xtol-type ascorbate developer with high capacity); Stock life: Unmixed powder lasts years; stock solution ~6 months (full container)
